title: Initialize Flask project folder structure
body: Set up the base folder structure for the Flask app with templates, static, and app folders.

title: Create base layout.html template with Bootstrap or Tailwind
body: This will be the main base template that includes the navigation bar and loads CSS framework.

title: Create index.html using layout.html as base
body: Design the homepage based on the prototype. This will extend layout.html and contain the main layout.

title: Add navigation bar with Home, About, Profile, Login, Sign Up
body: Add a responsive navbar at the top with required links and buttons.

title: Build left sidebar: Today's Habit section
body: Create input fields and '+' buttons for 5 habits: Read Book, Drink Water, Fitness, Podcast, Extra.

title: Center content: Habit Tracker visualization layout (static)
body: Add placeholder circles of various sizes with habit names inside to simulate habit progress.

title: Right sidebar: Static calendar layout
body: Create a table-based static calendar to show the current month with basic styling.

title: Apply global styling and responsive layout
body: Ensure proper spacing, padding, and responsiveness across the three-column layout using the selected CSS framework.

title: Make layout mobile-responsive (optional)
body: Ensure the habit tracker UI scales down for small screens using responsive CSS classes.

title: Use icons or colored tags for habit types (optional)
body: Enhance the visual appeal of habit inputs by using icons or color-coded labels.
